name: MudRunGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask m. r. g. What is the next mud run in Atlanta, GA”
”Alexa, open m. r. g. and list races near Atlanta, GA”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. r. g.
des: Use Mud Run Guide to find upcoming obstacle course races and mud runs near you. You'll be able to search any location (city or state), to see when the next races near that that location is. We even share discount codes to the races. Our directory includes nationwide series like Spartan Race, Warrior Dash, Tough Mudder, Savage Race, Rugged Maniac, Bone Frog Challenge, and more, as well as amazing local races!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
